\pard\cf1\f0\fs24\lang1033 ### Turkey. \f1\lang1049 Locative\par
\par
\f0\lang1033 #words:\f1\lang1049\par
\f2\lang1055 b\f0\lang1033 athroom - \f2\lang1055 banyo\par
hotel - otel\par
house - ev\par
post office - postane\par
\f0\lang1033 sea - \f2\lang1055 deniz\par
airport - havaliman\f3\u305?\f2\par
pool - havuz\f1\lang1049\par
\f0\lang1033 zoo - \f2\lang1055 hayvanat bah\f0\lang1033\'e7\f2\lang1055 esi\f1\lang1049\par
port\f2\lang1055  - liman\f1\lang1049\par
\f0\lang1033 museum - \f2\lang1055 m\f0\lang1033\'fc\f2\lang1055 ze\par
left - sol\par
right - sa\f3\u287?\f1\lang1049\par
\f0\lang1033 kitchen - \f2\lang1055 mutfak\par
\f0\lang1033 breakfast\f2\lang1055  \f0\lang1033 - \f2\lang1055 kahvalt\f3\u305?\f1\lang1049\par
food\f2\lang1055  - yemek\par
castle - kale\f1\lang1049\par
\par
\par
\par
\par
Ben kilisedeyim, sen neredesin?\par
Restoranda \f0\lang1033\'e7orba var.\f2\lang1055  There is soup at the restaurant.\par
Otelde ku\f3\'balar var.\f2  \f0\lang1033 There are birds at the hotel.\par
Ben okulday\f3\u305?m.\f0  I am at school.\par
Pasta pastanededir, postanede de\f3\u287?il.\f0  The cake is at the bakery, not at the post office.\par
Ben hastanedeyim, sen pastanedesin. I am at the hospital you are at the patisserie.\par
Fil postanede domates yer. The elephant eats a tomato at the post office.\par
Restoranda \'e7orba var. There is soup at the restaurant.\par
Banyo \'e7ok k\'fc\'e7\'fck.\f2\lang1055  \f0\lang1033 The bathroom is very small.\par
Sen bakkaldas\f3\u305?n.\f0  You are at the grocery store.\par
Tuvalette \'f6r\'fcmcek var. There is a spider in the toilet.\par
Evin bir odas\f3\u305?\f0 . A room of the house. (\f1\lang1049\'e4\'ee\'ec\'e0 \'ee\'e4\'ed\'e0 \'ea\'ee\'ec\'ed\'e0\'f2\'e0\f0\lang1033 )\par
Affedersin, Sultan Ahmet camisi nerede? Excuse me, where is the Blue Mosque?\par
Havuzda \'e7ocuklar var.\f2\lang1055  \f0\lang1033 There are children in the pool.\par
Denizde kaplumba\f3\u287?a yok.\f2\lang1055\par
Hayvanat bah\f0\lang1033\'e7esindeyiz.\f2\lang1055  We are at the zoo.\f0\lang1033\par
Kumsalda bira i\'e7!\f2\lang1055  Drink a beer on the beach!\f0\lang1033\par
\f1\lang1049 Kaptan limanda.\f2\lang1055  The captain is at the port.\par
Ben havaliman\f3\u305?nda onlara kitap okurum.\f2  I read a book to them at the airport.\par
\f3\u304?stanbul'da \f0\lang1033\'e7ok m\'fcze var.\f2\lang1055  \f0\lang1033 There are many museums in Istambul.\par
Solda bir k\'f6pek var. There is a dog on the left.\par
Sa\f3\u287?\u305?mda bir ku\'ba var.\f0  There is a bird on my right.\par
Ayasofya'n\f3\u305?n b\f0\'fcy\'fck bir bah\'e7esi var. The Hagia Sophia has a big garden.\par
\f3\u304?stanbul T\f0\'fcrkiye'nin kuzey bat\f3\u305?s\u305?nda.\f0  Istanbul is in the northwest of Turkey.\par
Ayasofya'n\f3\u305?n kuzeyinde \f0\'e7ok m\'fcze var. There are a lot of museums in the north of the Hagia Sophia.\par
\par
Kaplumba\f3\u287?alar onlarda.\f0  They have the turtles.\par
\par
\par
K\'fc\'e7\'fck kedi bizde. We have the little cat.\par
Eski \f3\'baarap sende.\f0  You have the old wine.\par
\f2\lang1055 Elmalar sende. \f0\lang1033 You have the apples.\par
Pasta onda. She has the cake.\par
Onlar benim patronlar\f3\u305?m.\f0  Those are my bosses.\par
\'d6rdek bende. I have the duck.\par
G\'fczel ku\f3\'balar onda.\f0  He has the beautiful birds.\par
Benim kedim orada.\f2\lang1055  \f0\lang1033 My cat is there. \f2\lang1055 My cat is over there.\f0\lang1033\par
\'d6\f3\u287?renciler kalede.\f0  The students are in the castle.\par
Bah\'e7ede, kahvalt\f3\u305?day\u305?m.\f0  I am in the garden, at breakfast.\par
Ben mutfaktay\f3\u305?m.\f0  I am in the kitchen.\par
Buras\f3\u305? bir postane.\f0  Here is a post office.\par
Ankara'da \'e7ok kedi var. There are many cats in Ankara.\par
Mimar Ankara'da \'e7ay i\'e7er. The architect drinks tea in Ankara.\par
Eski postanede k\'f6pekler var. There are dogs at the old post office.\par
\f2\lang1055 Neden havuzda de\f3\u287?\f2 il. Why is she not in the pool?\par
\f0\lang1033\'d6\f2\lang1055 rdekler denizde. The ducks are in the sea.\par
Limanda de\f3\u287?\f2 ilim havaliman\f3\u305?\f2 nday\f3\u305?\f2 m. I am not at the port, I am at the airport.\par
Ben havaliman\f3\u305?nda onlara kitap okurum.\f2  \f3 I read a book to them at the airport.\f0\lang1033\par
gen\'e7 filler onda\f2\lang1055 . She has the young elephants.\par
Buras\f3\u305? bir postane.\f2  \f0\lang1033 Here is a post office.\par
Orada kim var? Who is there?\par
Kahvalt\f3\u305?da kimin \f0\'e7ocuklar\f3\u305? var?\f0  Whose children are at the breakfast?\par
Bizim evimiz orada. Our house is there.\par
Bu oda. This room.\par
\par
\par
\par
\par
\par
\f2\lang1055\par
\par
\f1\lang1049\par

TxtContent:
### Turkey. Locative

#words:
bathroom - banyo
hotel - otel
house - ev
post office - postane
sea - deniz
airport - havalimanı
pool - havuz
zoo - hayvanat bahçesi
port - liman
museum - müze
left - sol
right - sağ
kitchen - mutfak
breakfast - kahvaltı
food - yemek
castle - kale




Ben kilisedeyim, sen neredesin?
Restoranda çorba var. There is soup at the restaurant.
Otelde kuşlar var. There are birds at the hotel.
Ben okuldayım. I am at school.
Pasta pastanededir, postanede değil. The cake is at the bakery, not at the post office.
Ben hastanedeyim, sen pastanedesin. I am at the hospital you are at the patisserie.
Fil postanede domates yer. The elephant eats a tomato at the post office.
Restoranda çorba var. There is soup at the restaurant.
Banyo çok küçük. The bathroom is very small.
Sen bakkaldasın. You are at the grocery store.
Tuvalette örümcek var. There is a spider in the toilet.
Evin bir odası. A room of the house. (дома одна комната)
Affedersin, Sultan Ahmet camisi nerede? Excuse me, where is the Blue Mosque?
Havuzda çocuklar var. There are children in the pool.
Denizde kaplumbağa yok.
Hayvanat bahçesindeyiz. We are at the zoo.
Kumsalda bira iç! Drink a beer on the beach!
Kaptan limanda. The captain is at the port.
Ben havalimanında onlara kitap okurum. I read a book to them at the airport.
İstanbul'da çok müze var. There are many museums in Istambul.
Solda bir köpek var. There is a dog on the left.
Sağımda bir kuş var. There is a bird on my right.
Ayasofya'nın büyük bir bahçesi var. The Hagia Sophia has a big garden.
İstanbul Türkiye'nin kuzey batısında. Istanbul is in the northwest of Turkey.
Ayasofya'nın kuzeyinde çok müze var. There are a lot of museums in the north of the Hagia Sophia.

Kaplumbağalar onlarda. They have the turtles.


Küçük kedi bizde. We have the little cat.
Eski şarap sende. You have the old wine.
Elmalar sende. You have the apples.
Pasta onda. She has the cake.
Onlar benim patronlarım. Those are my bosses.
Ördek bende. I have the duck.
Güzel kuşlar onda. He has the beautiful birds.
Benim kedim orada. My cat is there. My cat is over there.
Öğrenciler kalede. The students are in the castle.
Bahçede, kahvaltıdayım. I am in the garden, at breakfast.
Ben mutfaktayım. I am in the kitchen.
Burası bir postane. Here is a post office.
Ankara'da çok kedi var. There are many cats in Ankara.
Mimar Ankara'da çay içer. The architect drinks tea in Ankara.
Eski postanede köpekler var. There are dogs at the old post office.
Neden havuzda değil. Why is she not in the pool?
Ördekler denizde. The ducks are in the sea.
Limanda değilim havalimanındayım. I am not at the port, I am at the airport.
Ben havalimanında onlara kitap okurum. I read a book to them at the airport.
genç filler onda. She has the young elephants.
Burası bir postane. Here is a post office.
Orada kim var? Who is there?
Kahvaltıda kimin çocukları var? Whose children are at the breakfast?
Bizim evimiz orada. Our house is there.
Bu oda. This room.
